HotelElement.Name: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square West

Description.Text: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square West is a modern 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of New York. It boasts a gym, restaurant, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location just west of Times Square. Times Square is located in the heart of bustling Manhattan and is the bright, neon-lit centre of the prestigious and popular Broadway Theatre District. Nearby places of interest include sports and music venue Madison Square Garden, the Empire State Building, New York Public Library and the Museum of Modern Art. 34th Street - Penn subway station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular New York destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern 27-storey building. Facilities include a gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with warm tones and wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a work desk, 32-inch cable TV with on-demand content and an en-suite bathroom. The Bistro offers a varied menu with healthy options in a welcoming space, whilst guests can enjoy Starbucks coffee and a range of drinks at the hotel bar. There are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
